related.meaning: jumlah yang sangat kecil, kuantitas yang sangat sedikit

lessons.japanese: その食べ物には微かににんにくの風味があった。
lessons.indonesian: The food tasted slightly of garlic.

lessons.japanese: 少年は容貌が父親に微かに似ていた。
lessons.indonesian: The boy faintly resembled his father in appearance.

lessons.japanese: 少年は容貌が父親に微かに似ていた。
lessons.indonesian: The boy faintly resembled his father in appearance.

lessons.japanese: ふと、私は、後ろから聞えて来る微かな跫音に耳を聳てたのです。
lessons.indonesian: Suddenly, I raised my ears to the faint sound of footsteps coming from behind me.
